testcase.name: getTweet

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. JSON path user.screen_name doesn't match. Expected: a collection containing "leelajobs2391" Actual: [leelajobs239, leelajobs239, leelajobs239, leelajobs239, leelajobs239, leelajobs239, leelajobs239, leelajobs239, leelajobs239, leelajobs239, leelajobs239]
